disclaimerPage.subHeader: Blitz doesn't have access to any of your funds, if funds are lost we can not help you recover them.
disclaimerPage.imgCaption: 'With great power comes great responsibility' - Uncle Ben

securityOptionPage.header: First, Let's create your recovery phrase
securityOptionPage.subHeader: A recovery phrase is a series of 12 words in a specific order. This word combination is unique to your wallet. Make sure to have a pen and paper ready so you can write it down.

generateKeyPage.header: This is your password to your money, if you lose it you lose your money!
generateKeyPage.subHeader: Write it down with pen and paper and keep it safe!
generateKeyPage.disclaimer: WE CAN NOT HELP YOU IF YOU LOSE IT

skipMessage.header: We recommend that you write down your seed phrase
skipMessage.subHeader: If you do not have your seed phrase written down you risk losing your money.

home.error1: Please enter all of your keys.
home.error2: This is not a valid mnemonic.
home.error3: Your words are not the same as the generated words

manualInputPage.inputPlaceholder: Enter or paste a Liquid, or Lightning address/invoice

wallet.no_transaction_history: Send or receive a transaction for it to show up here

cameraPage.error2: You have already paid this invoice

about.text2: Blitz is a free and open source app under the
about.text5: This is a self-custodial Bitcoin Lightning wallet. Blitz does not have access to your funds, if you lose your backup phrase it may result in a loss of funds.
about.text12: Blitz is a powered by the Spark protocol. Spark is an
about.text14: where Spark Operators update the state of Bitcoin ownership off-chain
about.text15: allowing for fast, low-fee, and non-custodial transfers without touching the blockchain.

displayoptions.text6: Please reconnect to the internet to switch your denomination
displayoptions.text12: Swipe right from the main screen—whether you're on Contacts, Wallet, or the Home page—to quickly open the camera for scanning.

editcontactprofile.text10: You can only have letters, numbers, or underscores in your username, and must contain at least 1 letter.

fastpay.text1: Error adding inputed value, plase try again.
fastpay.text5: Fast pay allows you to instantly pay invoices below a specified threshold without needing to swipe for confirmation.

loginsecurity.text5: Device does not have a Biometric profile. Create one in settings to continue.
loginsecurity.text7: Device does not support Biometric login

seedphrase.text1: Keep this phrase in a secure and safe place
seedphrase.text2: Do not share it with anyone!
seedphrase.text3: Are you sure you want to show your recovery phrase?

crashreporting.text1:
Crash data helps us improve the stability and performance of our application.

When a crash occurs, the device information that is automatically recorded includes:

• Operating System: OS version, device orientation, and jailbreak status
• Device Details: Model, orientation, and available RAM
• Crash Information: Date of the crash and the app version

nodeinfo.text2: You currently do not have Lightning enabled. If you would like to enable Lightning, click the button below.
nodeinfo.text3: If you enable Lightning, Blitz will automatically open a channel for you when you reach a balance of
nodeinfo.text6: when you have a balance under
nodeinfo.text7: for a smooth onboarding experience and to help users send payments over the Lightning Network with smaller amounts.
nodeinfo.text16: Trampoline payments let the LSP find payment routes, making transactions faster but less private, as the LSP knows the destination.

lspdescription.text1: A Lightning Service Provider (Lsp) is a business that enables a more seamless experience on the Lightning Network. Such services include providing liquidity management and payment routing.
lspdescription.text2: Since the Lightning Network operates based on a series of channels, the size of a Lightning channel is naturally constrained. Using an Lsp decreases that constraint, making larger payments more feasible.
lspdescription.text3: It’s important to note that an Lsp DOES NOT HAVE ACCESS TO YOUR FUNDS. They are merely a helper to reduce the impact of the Lightning Network's liquidity constraint.

manualswap.text2: Handling transfer, please do not leave the page.

confirmpage.text2: Payment will create a new channel. Please send a smaller amount.

settings.text1: Error adding inputed value, plase try again.
settings.text3: Minimum channel open size cannot be smaller than
settings.text4: Minimum channel open size cannot be larger than
settings.text5: Amount can not be less than minimum swap amount
settings.text6: Unable to connect to the node at this time. Please try again later
settings.text10: By turning on auto channel rebalance, Blitz will automatically swap funds from your channel to the bank or the bank to your channels based on the percentage of outgoing capacity you initially want.
settings.text13: By turning on regulated channel open, if you reach your inbound liquidity limit during a session, new funds will automatically be swapped to your bank for future use without opening a new channel. Once your bank has the amount specified above, a channel will be opened.
settings.text15:
By enabling Lightning, you must connect to your Lightning node when loading the app. However, the Lightning node connection tends to fail more often than the Liquid node connection, which may prevent the app from loading.

By disabling Lightning, you ensure that your balance remains on Liquid, disabling both auto channel rebalancing and regulated channel opening.
settings.text17: The Max Channel Open Fee sets the highest amount you’re willing to pay in on-chain fees when opening a Lightning channel. If the network fee exceeds this limit, the channel won’t be opened
settings.text19: Minimum Rebalance sets the lowest amount of satoshis required for auto-rebalancing in Blitz Wallet. If the rebalance amount is below this limit, no rebalancing will occur. The amount can not be less than

errormessages.nointernet: Please reconnect to the internet to use this feature
